definitions.body: counsel, advice (= [[עֵחָה]]([[יְ]]))—´[[ע]] Ju Jdg 20:7 + 28 t.; cstr. [[עֲחַת]] Is 5:19 + 33 t.; sf. [[עֲחָתִי]] Pr 1:25 + 5 t. (+ Is 46:11 Qr; Kt [[עחתו]] better); [[עֲחָֽתְְ]] Ps 20:5, Ps 73:24; [[עֲחָתוֹ]] Ho 10:6 + 7 t. (incl. Is 46:10 Kt v. supr); [[עֲחָתָם]] Je 18:23 + 4 t.; pl. [[עֵחוֹת]] De 32:28 + 2 t.; [[עֲחָתָָיִךְ]] Is 47:13; —counsel, advice 2Sa 15:31, 2Sa 15:34, 2Sa 16:23, 2Sa 16:23, 2Sa 17:14, 2Sa 17:14, 2Sa 17:14, 2Sa 17:23, 1Ki 12:8, 1Ki 12:13, 1Ki 12:14 = 2Ch 10:8, 2Ch 10:13, 2Ch 10:14, 2Ch 22:5, 2Ch 25:16, Ezr 10:3 (where rd. [[אֲדׂנִי]] ´[[ע]] Reuss Ry), v:Ezr 10:8, Job 29:21; political consultation Is 47:13; as acc. cogn. 2Sa 17:7, 1Ki 1:12, Is 8:10, Ez Eze 11:2 ([[עחת־רָע]], ‖[[אָוֶן]]); c. [[הָב֫וּ]] give counsel Ju Jdg 20:7, 2Sa 16:20; ´[[חֵבִיא ע]] Is 16:3; ´[[עשׂה ע]] Is 30:1; [[אָשִׁית עֵחוֹת בְּנַפְשִׁי]] Ps 13:3; = design, purpose Ezr 4:5, Ne 4:9, 1Ch 12:20 (Baer), Ps 14:6, Ps 20:5, Je 18:23 (sq. [[עַל]] = against), Je 49:30 (‖[[מַחֲשָׁבָה]]); [[עֲחַת־גּוֹיִם]] Ps 33:10; suitable counsel for war (= generalship) 2Ki 18:20 = Is 36:5 (cf. Pr 20:18 infr.); also [[עֲחַת שָׁלוֹם]] Zec 6:13 counsel of peace; practical wisdom, sagacity Is 19:3, cf. v:Is 19:11, Je 19:7, De 32:28 (‖[[תְּבוּנׇה]]), Ho 10:6. Esp. in WisdLt and proph.; counsel = good counsle, wisdom Job 38:2, Job 42:3, Pr 12:15, Pr 20:5 (its seat [[בְּלֶב־אִישׁ]]); ‖[[תּוּשִׁיׇּה]] Pr 8:14, Is 28:29 (of ´[[י]]); ‖[[חָכְמָה]] Je 49:7; ‖[[חָכְמָה]] and [[תְּבוּנׇה]] Job 12:13, Pr 21:30; ‖[[מוּסָר]] Pr 19:20; ‖[[תַּחְבֻּלוֹת]] Pr 20:18 (cf. Is 36:5 supr.); [[נִפְתָּלִים]] ´[[ע]] Job 5:13; [[וּגְבוּרָה]] ´[[רוּחַ ע]] Is 11:2 (‖[[חָכְמָה וּבָינׇה]] ´[[ר]]); hearty counsel [[נֶפֶשׁ]] ´[[ע]] Pr 27:9; counsel of wisdom, when wisdom is personif. Pr 1:25, Pr 1:30 (‖[[תּוֹכַחַת]]); in bad sense [[רשׁעים]] ´[[ע]] Job 10:3, Job 21:16, Job 22:18, Ps 1:1, cf. Job 18:7, Ps 106:43, Is 29:15; of plan of ´[[י]]; ´[[י]] ´[[ע]] Ps 33:11, Pr 19:21, Is 19:17, Is 14:26 ([[הַיִעוּחָה]] ´[[הע]]), Is 25:1, Is 46:10, Is 46:11; [[קדושׁ ישׂראל]] ´[[ע]] Is 5:19; also Mic 4:12, Je 32:19 ([[גְּדׂל הָעֵחָה]]), Je 49:20, Je 50:45, Ps 106:13; [[עֶלְיוֹן]] ´[[ע]] Ps 107:11; instruction, guiding wisdom of ´[[י]] Ps 73:24; [[אִישׁ־עֲחָתוֹ]] i.e. counsellor of ´[[י]] Is 40:13; in fig. [[אַנְשֵׁי עֲחָתִי]] Ps 119:24 = my counsellors, said of testimonies of God; = prophecy, [[מלאכיו]] ´[[ע]] Is 44:26 (‖[[דְּבַר עַבְדּוֹ]]); [[מִוְּקֵנִים]] ´[[תִּאׁבַד ע]] Ez Eze 7:26 (cf. 1Ki 12:8; ‖[[חָזוֹן]], [[תּוֹרָה]]), [[מֵחָכָם]] Je 18:18 (‖[[דָּבָר]], [[תּוֹרָה]]).
